title: Skies of Rain
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I could never put my finger on the moment
You 
turned to a statue
I know you probably thought I noticed that in fact
You had turned into stone
[Pre-Chorus 1]
Pray tell, pray tell
Where did you go?
[Chorus]
I've lost all faith
Now that you're gonna look me in the face
So sick, sick of these lies you used to hide behind
There's no love 
in your skies of rain
[Verse 2]
I had always hoped that there would be more
To you than guilt trips and raindrops
Every single time I think of you
It leaves me feeling alone
[Pre-Chorus 2]
Farewell, farewell
It took me so long

[Chorus]
I've lost all faith
Now that you're gonna look me in the face
So sick, sick of these lies you used to hide behind
There's no love in your skies of rain
[Bridge]
And it's all gone, the connection between us
We're washed up as the driftwood on beaches
And you make no amend
I have no faith in a single word you say
[Chorus]
So sick, sick of these lies you used to hide behind
There's no love in your skies of rain
There's no love in your skies of rain
